name: tm42
effect: Teaches Facade to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Facade to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Dream Eater)

flavor_text.sun-moon: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned or burned, or if it has paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned or burned, or if it has paralysis.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
